sentences.english: The little Spring(Indian Summer) is thelightning before death. It has digested this year's demand.

sentences.english: And could the "Greek serenity" of later Greek  periods be only a red sunset?
sentences.chinese: 后期希腊时期的“希腊安宁”只是一种回光返照吗？

sentences.english: Well, hold on to your cash; this is just a dead-cat bounce.
sentences.chinese: 不过，还是保持你的现金吧，这不过是回光返照。

sentences.english: While their flame is high now, anyone can see that it is only the last radiance of a dying class.
sentences.chinese: 但是谁都看得出来，这只是垂死阶级的回光返照。

sentences.english: But they were like false signs of recovery in a patient upon whom death has passed its sentence.
sentences.chinese: 但是这就像被死亡判决的病人回光返照。

sentences.english: GLIMMER of recovery or a dead-cat bounce?
sentences.chinese: 究竟是一线希望抑或仅仅是回光返照？
